unnormalised: Hey everyone! Get ready for a blast because Diwali is just around the corner! This year, Diwali falls on 01/11/2024, so mark your calendars. Can you believe it's almost November already? Time flies, doesn't it?
normalised: Hey everyone! Get ready for a blast because Diwali is just around the corner! This year, Diwali falls on first November two thousand and twenty four, so mark your calendars. Can you believe it's almost November already? Time flies, doesn't it?

unnormalised: Preparations are in full swing, I tell you! Shops are already decked out, selling everything from diyas to delicious sweets. My mom's already making a list of all the mithai she wants to make – she's planning on starting on 28/10/2024 to get everything done on time. It’s a hectic time, but honestly, it's the best time of the year.
normalised: Preparations are in full swing, I tell you! Shops are already decked out, selling everything from diyas to delicious sweets. My mom's already making a list of all the mithai she wants to make – she's planning on starting on twenty eighth October two thousand and twenty four to get everything done on time. It’s a hectic time, but honestly, it's the best time of the year.

unnormalised: And speaking of celebrations, did you know that Bhai Dooj follows Diwali? It's on 05/11/2024 this year, a special day to celebrate the bond between brothers and sisters. So much to look forward to!
normalised: And speaking of celebrations, did you know that Bhai Dooj follows Diwali? It's on fifth November two thousand and twenty four this year, a special day to celebrate the bond between brothers and sisters. So much to look forward to!

unnormalised: Don't forget to plan your Diwali pooja! Most families perform the Lakshmi pooja in the evening, around 7:00 PM or 8:00 PM on 01/11/2024. Make sure you have all your pooja samagri ready.
normalised: Don't forget to plan your Diwali pooja! Most families perform the Lakshmi pooja in the evening, around seven P-M or eight P-M on first November two thousand and twenty four. Make sure you have all your pooja samagri ready.

unnormalised: So, get ready to light up your homes and hearts this Diwali! Wishing everyone a very happy and prosperous Diwali in advance! Remember to stay safe and have a fantastic time celebrating with your loved ones on 01/11/2024.
normalised: So, get ready to light up your homes and hearts this Diwali! Wishing everyone a very happy and prosperous Diwali in advance! Remember to stay safe and have a fantastic time celebrating with your loved ones on first November two thousand and twenty four.
